page.title: 11White Hart, New Mill.
page.content: Just off New Mill square is the recently renovated,200 year old public house,The White Hart.The landlord Michael Herron is a tenant of Tetley's the brewers of Leeds who are the owners.The pub is extremely busy and supplies traditional hand-pumped beers.On draught is;best bitter, mild, 2 lagers, Guinness and cider.There are also 9 varieties of bottled beer as well as spirits,wines and soft drinks.Food is served daily from 12 noon to 2.p.m.There are bar snacks or sandwiches.The pub's Sports and Social Club run 4 Darts teams and organise events such as Car Rallies.Thursday evening is a lively Disco Evening.Saturday teatime it is a popular venue for local footballers.It is the headquarters of Wooldale A.F.C.and The Rock A.F.C.
